name: Orbit (itch)
description:
*WARNING THIS GAME IS NOT FINISHED & IS VERY BUGGY*

Hello, welcome to "Orbit", a 2D puzzle game. This is our first game, so please leave some feedback! This game currently has 5 challenging levels, but more will be added. We are working on adding lots more too! Full screen is bugged & the exit button right now!

Features:

  • 5 challenging levels (more soon!)
  • Fun & Hard
  • Relaxing Music
  • Colorful
  • Power-ups, Portals & More
We are adding more things like new power-ups & characters! We appreciate any feedback we can get it help make the game better! This game will be free for everyone forever, but if you would like to donate, that would help the development on the game! We hope you have fun!

~ Jelly Labs
